Sentencas: Behaviors of oxygen species in the LSM/YSZ/LaAlO SOFC type reactor were investigated.
Titulo: TPD study in LSM/YSZ/LaAlO system for the use of fuel cell type reactor

Sentencas: The fuel cell type temperature-programmed desorption (FC-TPD) measurements were employed in three operating modes; i.e. (1) open circuit, (2) closed circuit without applied potential and (3) closed circuit with applied potential modes.
Titulo: TPD study in LSM/YSZ/LaAlO system for the use of fuel cell type reactor

Sentencas: Various pretreatment conditions, i.e. (a) open circuit, (b) closed circuit without applied potential and (c) closed circuit with applied potential, were investigated.
Titulo: TPD study in LSM/YSZ/LaAlO system for the use of fuel cell type reactor

Sentencas: The FC-TPD technique enables to discuss the oxygen species responsible for a combustion reaction and those for a coupling reaction, separately.
Titulo: TPD study in LSM/YSZ/LaAlO system for the use of fuel cell type reactor

Sentencas: The open circuit type FC-TPD showed that the applied potential during the pretreatment caused the increase in the amount of surface oxygen and the decrease in activation energy of desorption of oxygen at the anode catalyst.
Titulo: TPD study in LSM/YSZ/LaAlO system for the use of fuel cell type reactor

Sentencas: The closed circuit FC-TPD provided the combined effects of desorption and permeation.
Titulo: TPD study in LSM/YSZ/LaAlO system for the use of fuel cell type reactor

Sentencas: In addition, the FC-TPD analysis could correlate the behavior of adsorbed oxygen species to the NEMCA effect observed in the oxidative coupling of methane in the SOFC reactor.
Titulo: TPD study in LSM/YSZ/LaAlO system for the use of fuel cell type reactor
